mapper.insert:
insert into job_info
title,
created_at,
unit_name,
salary_type,
`status`,
`desc`,
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{created_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{unit_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{salary_type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{desc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update job_info
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_at = #{created_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
unit_name = #{unit_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salary_type = #{salary_type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
`desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update job_info set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{created_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, unit_name = #{unit_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salary_type = #{salary_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update job_info set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{created_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, unit_name = #{unit_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salary_type = #{salary_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM job_info
title LIKE "%"#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%",
AND created_at like "%"#{created_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}"%",
AND unit_name LIKE "%"#{unit_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%",
AND salary_type = #{salary_type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
`desc` LIKE "%"#{desc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}"%",
ORDER BY id
